title: White sails in Danish waters
creator_credit: Nordisk Films Kompagni, Paul Bang and Carl Otto Peterson
brief_description: Shows yachting in Danish waters. Tells how children and young people receive skilled instruction in the yacht clubs. We join a holiday cruise through some of Denmark’s loveliest regions, and experience a race on the sound.
creator_credit_for_label: Nordisk Films Kompagni, Paul Bang and Carl Otto Peterson
